title: Aetna hires former Caesars Entertainment CEO Gary Loveman
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
The former CEO of casino company Caesars Entertainment Corp. is joining health insurer Aetna. Gary Loveman will be an Aetna executive vice p... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
